channel.title: Whonix and bountysource.com
channel.description:
Any comments?
Homepage: https://www.bountysource.com
You find Whonix in search, but that is automatic, I didn't sign up Whonix or anything: https://www.bountysource.com/teams/whonix/issues?tracker_ids=607227
Such incentives might have social issues, turning down intrinsic motivation: https://blog.torproject.org/blog/tor-incentives-research-roundup-goldstar-par-braids-lira-tears-and-torcoin#incentives_motivation
bountysource won't work with our upcoming phabricator based bug tracker (https://www.whonix.org/forum/index.php/topic,651.0.html).

item.title: Whonix and bountysource.com
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Any comments?

Homepage:
https://www.bountysource.com

You find Whonix in search, but that is automatic, I didn’t sign up Whonix or anything:
https://www.bountysource.com/teams/whonix/issues?tracker_ids=607227

Such incentives might have social issues, turning down intrinsic motivation:
https://blog.torproject.org/blog/tor-incentives-research-roundup-goldstar-par-braids-lira-tears-and-torcoin#incentives_motivation

bountysource won’t work with our upcoming phabricator based bug tracker (https://www.whonix.org/forum/index.php/topic,651.0.html).
